fields.description: If enabled, only the assigned person (Assign To) can mark manual tasks as complete. If disabled, both Assign From and Assign To can mark tasks complete.
fields.label: Only Assignee Can Mark Complete

fields.description: If enabled, non-admin users will only see tasks where they are the Owner, Assign From, or Assign To. Administrator/System Manager/Workboard Admin Role can still see all.
fields.label: Restrict Task Visibility

fields.description: Users with this role can mark any task as Done or Complete regardless of assignment
fields.label: Workboard Admin Role
